hackathon-description-text: We believe that the best way to solve a problem is by collaborating with diverse students from different disciplines and bringing ideas to action. And this action is ignited through Hamp Hack; an interdisciplinary 24-hour dynamic hackathon for the five college consortium in the pioneer valley. The event serves to provide students with resources and mentoring to make working prototype solutions for problems that resonate in the world around us.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Prof. of Venture Capital Investment at UMASS Isenberg
Technical Support Leader at Viridis3D LLC
Maya Plugin Developer at Anzovin Studio

hackathon-rules:
Be respectful and comforting to each other. Make sure that your behavior is under this 
.
This is not a presentation-athon. Make something that's working and try to push your thinking forward.
The project must be developed entirely during the hackathon hours only.
Make sure you're only a team of 4 or 5 at max.
Make somthing that's a blend of different subjects, this will allow you to think in new directions.
Dont just make something that solves a problem. Make something that solves a problem AND also leverages the way people function.
Don't be bogged down into thinking that your project is very "ambitious" or "undoable". Don't let other's opinion or projects lower your confidence.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Funding to prototype and travel anywhere in the world for testing that prototype
Turn your idea into a startup with $8000

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Most creative use of Indico API

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Use your tech skills for good and hack online harassment! Build a software solution that can help reduce the frequency and/or severity of online harassment. Members of the winning team receive Hack Harassment Battery Packs!

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=893 West St, Amherst, MA 01002, USA
